import axios from 'axios'; const Portfolios = (props) =>{ const fetchPortfolio = () =>{ const query = ` query Portfolios { portfolios { _id, title company companyWebsite } }`; return axios.post('http://localhost:3000/graphql', {query}) .then(({data: graph}) => graph.data) .then(data => data.portfolios) } return( <>
